document_data.caption: A map showing the Lake of the Leech in northern Gnarhelm.
document_data.name: Lake of the Leech
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lake of the Leech''' was a small freshwater lake located in northern [[Gnarhelm]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Lake of the Leech touched the northern edge of [[Leechhome]], the only swamp in Gnarhelm. The lake was located just a few miles from Gnarhelm's northern coast on the [[Sea of Swords]]. It covered roughly {{SI|50|sq mi|k}}.
